snippet: Friday ended the worst week for markets since June as investors turned their attention to the coming negotiations over impending tax increases and spending cuts.
abstract: Stocks advance slightly but fail to avert the worst week for markets since June, as investors turn their attention from the presidential elections to coming negotiations over impending tax increases and spending cuts.
lead_paragraph: Friday ended the worst week for markets since June as investors turned their attention to the coming negotiations over impending tax increases and spending cuts.

headline.main: Shares Edge Up as Budget Concern Clashes With Strong Economic Data
headline.print_headline: Shares Edge Up as Budget Concern Clashes With Strong Economic Data
